text: We use SCCM and I had something similar happen today also. On one of my workstations, one of the September updates - 2023-09 .NET 6.0.22 Security Update for x64 Client (KB5030559), popped up as being required and then installed on its own. This workstation had already had this update installed back in September when I deployed the September updates. As far as I can tell this is only system to show this type of behavior

metadata.topic: SCCM Pushing out previously installed patches to a server
